subject: Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: Two men with decades in baseball, Bud Selig, the game’s commissioner, and Bill DeWitt, the St. Louis Cardinals owner, celebrated the most thrilling contest of their lives.
snippet: Two men with decades in baseball, Bud Selig, the game’s commissioner, and Bill DeWitt, the St. Louis Cardinals owner, celebrated the most thrilling contest of their lives.
